name: DHP_Navy_Orfino_Velour_Futon
reviews: The couch is easy to assemble and it easy to transition from the sofa mode into the flat, futon mode. It is light weight and the color is true to the picture. I wish it was more comfortable.
description:
The soft velour fabric, classic diamond tufted design and wood
scroll legs provide both high fashion and comfort. The DHP Orfino
Futon can be quickly transformed from sofa to sleeper to lounger,
making it a must have in any home.Classic wood scroll legsMid-century modern designSoft velour fabricDiamond tufted cushion designSimple assemblyWeight limit is 600 poundsSet includes: One (1) futonMaterials: Wood, microfiber, foamFinish: MicrofiberUpholstery color: NavyUpholstery fill: FoamShips in one (1) cartonWeight: 57.5 poundsSeat dimensions: 18 inches high x 70 inches wide x 25 inches
